meta.name: Royal Carols: Together at Christmas
meta.description: HRH The Princess of Wales hosts a special Christmas carol service at Westminster Abbey. Attended by HM The King, this year's service will pay tribute to HM Queen Elizabeth II.

videos.overview: The Duchess of Cambridge hosts a special Christmas carol service at Westminster Abbey, supported by The Royal Foundation, to recognise and celebrate the incredible work of individuals and organisations across the nation who have stepped up to support their communities.
